description: A tarnished silver star that gives an air of authority to the wearer, no matter if they are the original owner or not.
A tarnished golden shield that gives an air of authority to the wearer, no matter if they are the original owner or not.
A matte-finish silver shield identifies the wearer, or at least the original owner, as an authority who goes in when the bots just aren't enough.
A plastic name tag marking the wearer or the original owner as a real doctor of the medical kind.
A plastic name tag marking the wearer or the original owner as a real veterinary doctor.
A plastic name tag marking the wearer or the original owner as a career store manager.
